data.title: How much do Pentair PLC employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Pentair PLC is estimated to be approximate $95,765 per year. The majority pay is between $84,350 to $108,062 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Pentair PLC salary, Pentair PLC pay rate, and more.
data.text:
View salary at Pentair PLC by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Pentair PLC jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the salary range of different positions at Pentair PLC. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Manager, Distribution jobs at Pentair PLC earn the most with an average annual salary of $92,605, while Manager, Distribution jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $92,605.

The estimate average salary for Pentair PLC employees is around $95,765 per year, or the hourly rate of Pentair PLC rate is $46. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $108,062. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employee’s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.

JOB TITLE SALARY RANGE AVERAGE SALARY COMPANY NAME Manager, Distribution $79,894 - $106,125 $92,605 Pentair PLC

DISCLAIMER: The salary range presented here is an estimation that has been derived from our proprietary algorithm. It should be noted that this range does not originate from the company's factual payroll records or survey data.

1. How much does Pentair PLC in the United States pay?

Pentair PLC pays its employees an average of $95,765 per year. The average salary at Pentair PLC range from $84,350 to $108,062 per year. Manager, Distribution jobs at Pentair PLC earn the most with an average annual salary of $92,605, while Manager, Distribution jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $92,605.

2. Do Pentair PLC employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Pentair PLC is lesser than Asthmatx Inc. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Pentair PLC is $108,062 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at Asthmatx Inc is $125,804 per year.

3. How much does Pentair PLC pay compared to Asthmatx Inc?

The average annual salary at Pentair PLC is $95,765, or an hourly wage of $46, in comparison to Asthmatx Inc which pays $111,492 per year or $54 per hour.

4. Which job skills can boost a Manager, Distribution salary at Pentair PLC?

Leadership, Logistics and Customer Service are key to a Manager, Distribution job at Pentair PLC. Possessing these skills could lead to a higher salary. You can learn and develop high income skills now if you’re looking for a position at Pentair PLC.

5. What is the lowest salary at Pentair PLC?

The lowest paying job at Pentair PLC is Manager, Distribution with an annual salary of $92,605 or an hourly rate of $46.
